author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2011: Remove deprecated calls from BW tests

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Patrick Antivackis "NPE when calling a page like http://localhost:8080/cmssite/cms" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3096) - OFBIZ-3096
A Null Pointer Exception is generated by RequestHandler.trackVIsit and trackStat if a page is called without view and without trailing slash after the controller.

This may be not a problem for non cms site, but it is for cms site. Calling http://localhost:8080/cmssite/cms will generate a NPE; WIth the included pacth, calling the same page will display the default page.

author: boisvert
msg: SQL exceptions during PM API calls are now properly handled;  refactored code a bit to avoid getting many connections
